claims.object: Experiment involving sending a beam of electrons through mercury vapor and observing the loss of kinetic energy
Determining excitation potential and ionization potential of mercury atom

surface_layer.definition: An experiment to demonstrate the quantization of energy levels in atoms.

deep_layer.mechanism: Electrons lose kinetic energy when they collide with mercury atoms and excite them to a higher energy state.
